desc: Patti Cakes’ baked goods are handcrafted in small batches to provide no less than the very finest fruitcakes, puddings, and sauces in the world.

layout.text: Patti Cakes’ baked goods are handcrafted in small batches with real butter and cream and only the highest quality ingredients. From our bakery in Reston, Manitoba, Canada we have been striving since 1990 to provide no less than the very finest fruitcakes, puddings, and sauces in the world.
